OOC: I'm sorry I got so pissed off, by the way, I should have handled it in=
 a more laid back manner.

However, you replied to everyone else. Am I not =
important? I know I'm not, but shall I be treated like I was important if I=
'm a member? I do not know the point, but I know the rules. Maybe I said so=
mething that offended you and caused you to block me? I did not know, and y=
et I was very angry and didn't think. After all, I blocked Dewboy, what's t=
o keep someone from blocking me?

I'm filled with vicious posts. You'll see=
 alot more. Whatever the case, I'm not a nice person. I think you realize t=
his. I trashed you pretty good, didn't I?

My anxiety towards Neo Beast War=
s is evident. I don't think I belong. Tell you what, since I'm so unimporta=
nt, perhaps I should make a poll asking people if they think I should stay.=
 I don't want anyone to feel sorry for me and want them to vote exactly as =
they see fit. I'm sure I'll lose though, as I've put down everyone in the R=
PG at one point.

Oh, and Dewboy's vote doesn't count...

  ----- Original =
Message ----- 
  From: Tankor 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednes=
day, November 20, 2002 8:03 PM
  Subject: Re: maxi base


  sorry man its j=
ust hard sometimes for me to get online

    OOC: It was obvious you wanted the nWo d=
ead, Tankor, since you completely ignored my attacks twice. Tankor, you are=
 nothing but a shit stain. I take that back, you're a shit stain and a mode=
r. However, if you apologize right now then maybe my assault will stop. But=
 since you're dickless, I don't expect it from the likes of you.

    Death=
 to Tankor and his shitty pathetic faction...
